name: INTERNATIONAL SUMMIT ON ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
content: Spectrum Conferences takes the pleasure to invite all the participants from all over the world to attend International Summit on Environmental Science and Engineering which will take place during June 15-17, 2023 in Paris, France. This conference is to present the most recent developments. Highly cited researchers, industrial leaders, and exhibitors across the globe will share their research, showcasing commercials in all current market fields. The interdisciplinary field of Environmental Science and Engineering is the design and discovery of new materials which play a prominent role in industrial, medical, defense, and scientific research applications. The opportunities arising from Environmental Science and Engineering offer the potential for even greater societal impact in the next few decades.
